com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices

Class WZAudioDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZAudioDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WZBroadcastAPI.AudioBroadcaster, WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster

    public class WZAudioDevice
extends Object
implements WZBroadcastAPI.AudioBroadcaster
    Encode an audio stream The object wraps a media encoder running on a dedicated thread. The various control messages may be sent from arbitrary threads (typically the app UI thread). The encoder thread manages both sides of the encoder (feeding and draining)

    • Method Detail

      • getAudioSource

        public int getAudioSource()
        Returns the actively configured input device for capturing audio
        Returns:
        An identifier for the active audio source. Possible values are those listed at MediaRecorder.AudioSource
        See Also:
        android.media.MediaRecorder.AudioSource

      • setAudioSource

        public void setAudioSource(int audioSource)
        Sets the actively configured input device for capturing audio.
        Parameters:
        audioSource - An identifier for the active audio source. Possible values are those listed at MediaRecorder.AudioSource. The default value is MediaRecorder.AudioSource.CAMCORDER. Note that setting this while audio is actively being captured will have no effect until a new capture session is started. Setting this to an invalid value will cause an error to occur at session begin.
        See Also:
        android.media.MediaRecorder.AudioSource

      • isSamplingAudio

        public boolean isSamplingAudio()
        Indicates if audio samples are currently being read from the audio input device and passed along to sample listeners or not
        Returns:
        true if audio samples are currently being read from the audio input device and passed along to sample listeners, false otherwise

      • getBroadcastConfig

        public WZBroadcastConfig getBroadcastConfig()
        Description copied from interface: WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        Returns the configuration settings for an active broadcast session. Note that this should only return a non-null value in between calls to prepareForBroadcast() and stopBroadcasting()
        Specified by:
        getBroadcastConfig in interface WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        Returns:
        the configuration settings for the active broadcast session or the broadcast session currently in the preparation stage

      • prepareForBroadcast

        public WZStatus prepareForBroadcast(WZBroadcastConfig broadcastConfig)
        Description copied from interface: WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        This method is called to initialize each component of a broadcast. Upon successful initialization, each component must set it's status to WZState.READY or WZState.IDLE and indicate the error in the status as well.
        Specified by:
        prepareForBroadcast in interface WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        Parameters:
        broadcastConfig - The broadcast configuration
        Returns:
        The overall status after transitioning each broadcast component to WZState.READY

      • startBroadcasting

        public WZStatus startBroadcasting()
        Description copied from interface: WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        This method is called on each broadcast component to begin a live streaming broadcast. Upon success, each component must set it's status to WZState.RUNNING or WZState.IDLE and indicate the error in the status as well
        Specified by:
        startBroadcasting in interface WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        Returns:
        The overall status after transitioning each broadcast component to WZState.RUNNING

      • stopBroadcasting

        public WZStatus stopBroadcasting()
        Description copied from interface: WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        This method is called on each broadcast component to end a live streaming broadcast. Upon success, each component must set it's status to WZState.IDLE
        Specified by:
        stopBroadcasting in interface WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
        Returns:
        The overall status after transitioning each broadcast component to WZState.IDLE
